answers.answer: Hi There,Thanks for writing.The possibility of neuropathy cannot be ruled out entirely even though your thyroid levels are normal and cervical spine MRI is clean.Other possibilities like diabetes and B complex deficiency also need to be looked into.I would suggest you to do some gentle breathing exercises and take B complex supplements and see if it helps with your symptoms.Good luck!

question: feels like nerve firing in back of head down center of back and some in thighs.  passed 2 mri brain clean over 6 months apart. cervical. spine clean.. can this be nerves damaged. or  anxiety. my doctors think in anxiety. could adrenalin./ really cause tyhis .. no external signs.  internal feelings in  back head upper spine. area. any other ideas. started with a bad viral infection 1 year ago. that left me with nerve inflamation tremors , heart papultaions. later found out  enlarged tyroid , nodules susupected for cancerr was removed nov 20 .. heart rate has back to normal. no papultations ,, reamining  symtoms are the nerves,   any ideas other than anxiety.  my tyroid levels are normal now also.
title: nerve firing
